page.title: 12Haworth Education
page.content: {Haworth First School}in{Butt Lane was originally built as the county secondary school at the start of the century.Today pupils are aged 4 to 9.At 9 years old they go to{Hartington {Middle School}which was built 3 years ago just up the road.From there most go to{Oakbank Grammar School}in {Keighley.}This division of education dates from{1968. There are about 180 children on the roll and numbers are falling.
